About Us

Founded in 2003,Xerxes India started as a small family-owned business in the heart of Mangalore. What began as a humble shop with a commitment to delivering top-notch bike accessories has grown into a leading brand trusted by riders worldwide.

Over the years, we have evolved, expanded our product line, and embraced cutting-edge technology to ensure that we offer the latest innovations to our customers. However, one thing has remained constant â€“ our dedication to providing the best value and an unparalleled riding experience.

We stand by the quality of our products. Every item in our catalog is rigorously tested to meet the highest industry standards.

Thank you for choosing Xerxes India as your trusted source for bike accessories. We look forward to being part of your adventures,and we're excited to support you on your journey. Happy Riding!!!

); }; export default Aboutus;
